com.foreach.across.core.registry

Class IncrementalRefreshableRegistry<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.registry.RefreshableRegistry<T>
      • com.foreach.across.core.registry.IncrementalRefreshableRegistry<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<T>, Collection<T>

    @Refreshable
public class IncrementalRefreshableRegistry<T>
extends RefreshableRegistry<T>

    Extends the RefreshableRegistry by scanning for members every time a module has bootstrapped. Modules later in the bootstrapping order will immediately see all members added by previous modules, whereas a regular RefreshableRegistry will only refresh its members after the entire context has been bootstrapped.
